snippet: The most memorable play of spring training involved a low level Mets prospect named Luis Guillorme. And he was not even on the diamond at the time....

headline.main: Frank Gehry and Daniel Barenboim on Their New Concert Hall in Berlin
headline.print_headline: Frank Gehry and Daniel Barenboim on Their New Concert Hall in Berlin

lead_paragraph: The most memorable play of spring training involved a low level Mets prospect named Luis Guillorme. And he was not even on the diamond at the time.
